attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Although Paul Gray has tendered his resignation, Alistair Darling should also have the grace and manners to resign for his overall responsibility for the absolutely worst and most disgraceful shambles over the details of 7.25 million families - 25 million people being LOST IN THE POST! NO MORE LESSONS HAVE BEEN LEARNED - WE ARE SICK TO DEATH OF HEARING IT!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
